scripts.preview: npm run build && wrangler pages dev ./dist
scripts.db:local:check: wrangler d1 execute DB --local --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'"
scripts.db:preview:push: wrangler d1 migrations apply treasure-cave-preview --env preview --remote
scripts.db:preview:check: wrangler d1 execute DB --env preview --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'" --remote
scripts.db:remote:push: wrangler d1 migrations apply treasure-cave --env production --remote
scripts.db:remote:check: wrangler d1 execute DB --env production --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'" --remote
scripts.db:remote:restore: powershell -Command "$file = Get-ChildItem ./backups/remote-*.bookmark | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if ($file) { $content = Get-Content $file; $match = $content | Select-String -Pattern 'The current bookmark is ''([^'']*)'''; if ($match) { $bookmark = $match.Matches.Groups[1].Value; Write-Host 'Found bookmark:' $bookmark; wrangler d1 time-travel restore treasure-cave --bookmark=$bookmark } else { Write-Host 'No bookmark found in file' } } else { Write-Host 'No backup file found' }"
scripts.kv:local:set:version: npx wrangler kv key put --preview false --local --binding=APP_KV app:version "1.0.0"
scripts.kv:local:set:config: npx wrangler kv key put --preview false --local --binding=APP_KV app:config "{\"name\":\"My Vue App\",\"version\":\"1.0.0\",\"updated\":\"2024-05-13\"}" --metadata="{\"contentType\":\"application/json\"}"
scripts.kv:local:set:temp: npx wrangler kv key put --preview false --local --binding=APP_KV temp "临时值" --ttl=3600
scripts.kv:local:list-keys: npx wrangler kv key list --preview false --local --binding=APP_KV
scripts.kv:preview:set:version: npx wrangler kv key put --preview --binding=APP_KV app:version "1.0.0"
scripts.kv:preview:set:config: npx wrangler kv key put --preview --binding=APP_KV app:config "{\"name\":\"My Vue App\",\"version\":\"1.0.0\",\"updated\":\"2024-05-13\"}" --metadata="{\"contentType\":\"application/json\"}"
scripts.kv:preview:set:temp: npx wrangler kv key put --preview --binding=APP_KV temp "临时值" --ttl=3600
scripts.kv:deployset:version: npx wrangler kv key put --preview false --remote --binding=APP_KV app:version "1.0.0"
scripts.kv:deployset:config: npx wrangler kv key put --preview false --remote --binding=APP_KV app:config "{\"name\":\"My Vue App\",\"version\":\"1.0.0\",\"updated\":\"2024-05-13\"}" --metadata="{\"contentType\":\"application/json\"}"
scripts.kv:deployset:temp: npx wrangler kv key put --preview false --remote --binding=APP_KV temp "临时值" --ttl=3600
scripts.kv:deploy:list-keys: npx wrangler kv key list --preview false --remote --binding=APP_KV
scripts.r2:create-bucket: npx wrangler r2 bucket create app-files
scripts.r2:create-preview-bucket: npx wrangler r2 bucket create app-files-dev
